footer.Footer__cta-title: Start saving on fuel costs today with a new spoiler.

beneficiary.value: CAR-TRADE Industrial and Commercial Limited Liability Company

project.value: Building energetic developments targeting the use of renewable energy and the increase of energy efficiency at the CAR-TRADE Ltd Seregélyes site

content.value: The development aims to reduce the operational costs of the company, mainly through locally produced renewable energy. For this purpose, CAR-TRADE Ltd submitted a support application for the GINOP 4.1.4-19-2019 call announced by the European Union and the Hungarian Government, which the issuing organization found worthy of support. To reduce electricity consumption, two 50kVA connection power solar systems were installed and commissioned on the roofs of the hall buildings at the company's site. The nominal power of the solar panels is 116.16 kWp. The buildings are physically located at 8111 Seregélyes Jánosmajor Industrial Zone 025/54. The direct current produced by the modules is converted into alternating current by 2 FRONIUS ECO 25.0-3-S, 2 FRONIUS Symo 15.0-3-M, and 1 FRONIUS Symo 20.0-3-M inverters. These devices are equipped with an integrated network connection suitable device that enables them to process the monitoring data resulting from the operation and display them through a web interface. For the protection of the electrical network, overvoltage protection devices were installed in accordance with standards and legal regulations. The technical handover took place, the system was taken over by CAR-TRADE LTD for operation. As a result of the investment, the company's primary energy consumption will decrease by 689.99 GJ, and the emission of greenhouse gases will decrease by 96.13 tons every year.

hero.lead-2: , we deliver custom spoilers for all truck categories, trusted by regional industry leaders. Our spoilers combine efficiency and style, backed by decades of experience.

advantages.HomeAdvantages__subtitle: It’s not only about saving money

roi.HomeROI__description: Discover how much you can save on fuel costs with our spoilers. Just input your truck's details and driving habits to see your potential ROI.

HomeROI__cta.2: Head to the shop and find your spoiler in 3 minutes!

about.HomeAbout__subtitle: We strive to be your truck's Best Companion
about.HomeAbout__description: Since 1991, we've specialized in manufacturing truck spoilers and accessories, focusing on fuel efficiency, driving safety and style. We are committed to product quality, a wide product catalogue and efficient customer interaction. This makes our customers satisfied, and enables us to serve any need quickly. In 2019, we expanded our facility with two, 1.100 square metres manufacturing-, fitting- and storage halls, where we build, store and mount spoilers for our esteemed customers.

notFound.heading: Page Not Found
